n1=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr_1=array(0)
for(i in 1:n1){
  arr_1[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
n2=n1-1
arr_2=array(0)
for(i in 1:n2){
  arr_2[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
i=1
count=0
while(arr_1[i]-arr_2[i]==0){
  arr_1[i]-arr_2[i]
  i=i+1
  count=count+1
}
print(count+1)
